# Chris Misztur

> Chris Misztur is the President & Founder of Mr. IIoT, specializing in building Smart Factories, both real and virtual. With over 25 years of experience, he digitally transforms manufacturing by integrating business systems into factory processes and applying innovative technologies.

Based in the Greater Chicago Area, Chris Misztur has over 25 years of experience as President & Founder of Mr. IIoT. His expertise spans Industrial IoT, Smart Factory implementation, Industry 4.0, and digital transformation, leveraging technologies like SHARC, DIME, MTConnect, and OPC-UA. He developed the "5C" closed-loop feedback approach to IIoT implementation.
